title: MARIENBAD - multiple font ID - sans serif, serif
content:
Looking for an ID on multiple fonts here, namely the sans serif used for MARIENBAD as well as the serifs for ENCENS and ASTIER DE VILLATE

Many thanks for any help in advance!  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131200922im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202015-01-29%20at%204_4393.09.11%20PM.png)

author: Danny_Miller

comments.content: Marianbad is Univers Ultra Condensed. The serif I can't pin down, looks like it should be some flavour of Garamond but I can't nail it I'm afraid.
